Contradict fact: The claim that Chandrashekhar Azad's real name is Naseemuddin Khan contradicts the fact that Azad himself has mocked the claim and clarified that Naseemuddin is not his real name.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence to suggest that the claim exaggerates any aspect.
Understate: There is no evidence to suggest that the claim understates any aspect.
Falters at times: There is no evidence to suggest that the claim falters at times.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is propagated by a Twitter handle and shared on Facebook by various groups, but there is no credible evidence or source to back up the claim.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Chandrashekhar Azad's real name is Naseemuddin Khan without providing any substantial evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no alternative explanation provided in the claim.
